summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from June 28, 2019, regarding scheduling a case briefing on the Epstein investigation for the Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) on the following Monday at 3:30 p.m. It shows internal coordination within the FBI's New York office.

persons.name: Paul Byrne
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of the forwarded email regarding the Epstein case briefing.

events.title: Epstein Case Briefing for ADIC
events.description: A scheduled briefing on the Epstein case for the Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) at the FBI's New York office.

keyFacts: An internal FBI case briefing on Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for Monday, July 1, 2019, at 3:30 p.m.
The briefing was intended for the Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC), indicating high-level attention within the FBI.
The email chain shows coordination within the FBI's New York field office regarding the Epstein investigation in June 2019.
